definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
to set an example (idiom); to serve as a model

sentences.english: A moving legend was often told around the area of Zhongxian County, Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 在四川忠县一带，则流传着一则感人肺腑的传说。

sentences.english: The second failing is an ironic flipside of success.
sentences.chinese: 第二个失败则是对欧元成功的讽刺。

sentences.english: The whole wardrobe door on the door, then the train made a beautiful articles.
sentences.chinese: 有门的整体衣柜，则在趟门上做起了美丽文章。

sentences.english: The semi-duplex work form was adopted between suspending gap sensor and control…
sentences.chinese: 而悬浮间隙传感器和控制器间则采用半双工方式工作。

sentences.english: Lincoln, in contrast, is sui generis.
sentences.chinese: 相反，林肯则是独一无二的。

sentences.english: If issues remain, they are reallocated based on their type.
sentences.chinese: 如果仍然有问题，则会根据其类型进行重新分配。

sentences.english: This NNC is utilized by way of associative memory.
sentences.chinese: 网络的使用利用联想记忆法则。

sentences.english: DNP treatment reduced the alternative respiration pathway capacity.
sentences.chinese: 而DNP处理则降低交替呼吸途径容量。

sentences.english: The tensile strength and elongation of the reticulated foams increase with the pore diameter.
sentences.chinese: 泡孔增大，则拉伸强度和伸长率降低。

sentences.english: If you feel you have reached this page in error then please contact our webmaster .
sentences.chinese: 如果你认为这已达成一页误差则请洽我们的站长。

sentences.english: Money can be good or bad, but prajna is always good.
sentences.chinese: 财富有善有恶，般若则无有不善。

sentences.english: For him to take that opportunity - he deserves a lot of respect for that.
sentences.chinese: 他则把握了那些机会，他配得上这些尊重。

sentences.english: A big investor is very displeased.
sentences.chinese: 一位大投资者则非常不满。

sentences.english: Trouble develops, however, when any human instinct or appetite causes overdeveloped.
sentences.chinese: 但假使人的欲求或喜好过度膨胀则会带来麻烦。

sentences.english: To the East, stark white concrete and armed guards.
sentences.chinese: 而在东面则是森森白墙，荷枪警哨。
夜晚的污染程度则会下降。

definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
